menu.title: 'Fitness' menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. The product of active and healthy people. This is a completely new product with the best price and high quality!

menu.title: 'Lean' menu
menu.descr: The Lean menu is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein due to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: 'Premium' menu
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu we use not only beautiful design of packing, but also qualitative execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruit - restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
